trans-unit.source: Represents a proxy code generator.

Use the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ProxyGenerator.GetClientProxyScript%2A> method to retrieve the ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is used to generate the proxy class for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied.
Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

The GetClientProxyScript method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied.
The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class.
When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> attribute applied.

If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] or other development environments.
As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.
The type of the object to obtain the script for.
The location of the endpoint.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include XML code comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The proxy generation code.
The type or path parameter is .
The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type using the path and service end point.

The <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ProxyGenerator.GetClientProxyScript%2A> method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] service, or for static page methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> attribute applied.
The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class.
When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute> attribute applied.

If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] or other development environments.
As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.
The type of the object to obtain the script for.
The location of the endpoint.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include XML code comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The service endpoint.
The proxy generation code.
The type or path parameter is .
The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
